CustomField.description: [DrawLoop]: Used in WF Outbound Message [Task 11630] DDP = Licensing Application Summary Report ; Delivery = SMTP - ODJFS IA Updated & SMTP - ODE IA Updated
CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "Application - CC Center", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a03r0000000xtEK;Deploy:a01r0000001LWS1", "Application - FCC", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a03r0000000xtEK;Deploy:a01r0000001LWS1", "Application - ODE Program", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a03r0000000xtEK;Deploy:a01r0000001LWS9", "")
CustomField.label: Drawloop_Next IA Updated
